vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.21;
son of: Shelah (H7956);
brother of: Er (H6147H), Jokim (H3137), Joash (H3101K) and Saraph (H8315);
father of: Mareshah (H4762H)
§ Laadah = "order"
son of Shelah and grandson of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Selá; fundador de Maresá; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉大 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "秩序, 命令"
示拉的兒子, 猶大的孫子 (代上4:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉大 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "秩序, 命令"
示拉的儿子, 犹大的孙子 (代上4:21)
